definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

sentences.english: When boiling vegetables, use enough water to cover them and keep the lid on the saucepan.
sentences.chinese: 煮菜时，用水将菜充实吞没，并将锅盖盖上。

sentences.english: Cover, and let rise until doubled in size, about 45 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 盖上湿布进行基本发酵至面团两倍大，大约45分钟。

sentences.english: They topped off the hut with a straw thatch.
sentences.chinese: 他们给小屋盖上茅草屋顶。

sentences.english: Close the lid and turn the knob to pork cooking cycle to stew about 15 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 盖上盖子，调至肉类档位焖煮大约15分钟。

sentences.english: Cover yourself with a light blanket if you chill easily.
sentences.chinese: 如果你对冷很敏感，请在自己身上盖上一条薄毯。

sentences.english: Each tier of the drums must be covered with plenty of boards in order to obtain even distribution of the weight.
sentences.chinese: 每层桶必须盖上大量板子以便使得重量平均开来。

sentences.english: Remove the lower insert from the bearing cap.
sentences.chinese: 从轴承盖上拆去下轴瓦。

sentences.english: Cover and let the balls rise to double the size again.
sentences.chinese: 盖上保鲜纸，再次发酵成2倍大。

sentences.english: I can't make the cover of the tin fit on.
sentences.chinese: 我不能将这罐头的盖子盖上。

sentences.english: Bring to a boil, reduce the heat, cover and simmer 45 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 将其煮沸后调小火候，盖上盖炖45分钟。

sentences.english: Cover the main engine turrubbisexualsh bisexualne filter net with canvas.
sentences.chinese: 将主机透平过滤网处用帆布盖上。

sentences.english: A postage meter can stamp mail automatically.
sentences.chinese: 盖戳机可以自动为信件盖上邮戳。

sentences.english: Cover them with clean paper or large leaves.
sentences.chinese: 在上面盖上干净的纸或者大的叶子。

sentences.english: Shroudthem, embalm them, cover themallover with tender pride.
sentences.chinese: 套罩，涂香油，替他们盖上柔嫩的自尊。

sentences.english: Just rub Tiger Balm on the chest and cover with a warm towel.
sentences.chinese: 因此把老虎油涂抹在胸膛时应该盖上一块热毛巾。

sentences.english: Please pass up the paint pot and brush; I'll put another coat on the ceiling.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆没有把油漆罐的盖子盖上，油漆已结皮不能用了。

definition: to seal (with official stamp)/to stamp/fig. to ratify/to put lid on (cooking pot)/to cap/to build an extension or additional storey
pad/cushion/mat/to pad out/to fill a gap/to pay for sb/to advance (money)
